notes.text: I played sylvans 2 days ago till legend 2 with no losses and today tried to hit kog and I couldnt, I was getting 1 win then 1 loss (repeat). So I wanted to have fun instead of rushing kog and this deck won me 5 games straight, really easy. 3 wins against sylvans otked them round 2/3, 1 win against weevil burn and 1 win against lp boost amazoness (the last one). Chaos locks down many meta decks and ye full destruction deck otk potential on maximum .. ME GUSTO (tbh I dont know how it can handle a full climb but here we post what got us kog so
